website.title: Mrcomputer1's Pizza Count Progress Bar
website.howmanypostsdoyouhave: How many pizzas do you have on Scratch?
website.howmanypostsdoyouhavehelp: Go to Table Talk Scratch then go to the bottom then click Show your cookbooks/pizzaz click the POSTS link not TOPICS
website.previewbtn: Preview and Download image! After clicking wait for image then click again then press download
website.colorrequires: <b>Requires COLOR inputs - Use Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome and Opera - Safari and Microsoft Internet Explorer not supported
